ygData.subject: RE: SBLive crashes (OT) Sound Problems in general
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehehe, well - don t know bout that Mushroom men sound an aweful lot like a poggostick to me - for anyone out there that might actually remember what a
ygData.messageBody:
Hehehe, well - don't know bout that Mushroom men sound an aweful lot like a
poggostick to me - for anyone out there that might actually remember what a
poggostick was. Or a date stamper - course - what's a Mushroom man SUPPOSED
to sound like - guess poggostick is fine.

It does usually give my group a chuckle when I point out the similarities
tho.



At 04:45 PM 1/30/00 -0600, you wrote:
>From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
>
>Oh yes.. Virtually every mob has a movement and idle sound of some sort.
>The sounds effects in EQ are the best of any game I've every played. That's
>the one thing that I have *never* seen a complaint about in any forum.
>There aren't any sounds that I can think of in the game that sound "wrong".
>The next time you play, pay attention to some of the sounds and try to
>imagine how they came up with them. Ambient sounds, beetles, spiders
>walking, snakes hissing, frogloks (splicka, splicka, splicka), Aviaks,
>lizards in CT, giants, Spectres, Ghouls... The sounds effects in EQ are a
>work of art that surpass the graphics by a healthy margin imo.
